#include<iostream>
#include<cmath>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	int n,var,sum,val;
	while(t--)
	{
          cin>>n;
          var=n;
          sum=0;
          while (var) {
                sum+=(var%10);
                var/=10;
          }
          val=n*(1<<sum);
          cout<<val<<endl;
    
	}
	return 0;
}
